nodes.text: The Undying was a large capital ship with unknown capabilities. It was larger than the other superweapons created with the Sun Razer.
Like many capital ships throughout history, the Undying had a triangular shape. It had a very broad command bridge on its dorsal surface towards the back of the ship.

Using the Sun Razer, the Sith Empire was able to complete its creation in years instead of decades. All the projects fueled by the Sun Razer were overseen by Darth Mekhis and discovered by Theron Shan and Jedi Master Ngani Zho upon their infiltration and capture in the Vesla system.
